participant_1.background:
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city.
I wear contacts now.
i played football in high school.
I don't like to talk about my favorite food.

participant_2.background:
My favorite thing to do on the weekends is to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films.
i work at a bar.
My family is small, and we don't have a lot of money
My favorite websites are pet health sites, especially ones with information on poodles.
my mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.

content.text: Hi! What are your hobbies?
I like to watch foreign films and wear band t-shirts on the weekends.
I love foreign films! What are some of your favorites?
I really enjoyed "Pan's Labyrinth" and "The Battle Royale".
Those are both great films! I love the way they use symbolism and metaphor.
Me too! Have you seen any recently?
I just watched "The Witch". It was really good, but it was also really scary.
I've heard good things about that one. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a slow burn, but it's really worth it.
Sounds good. I'll add it to my list.
What do you do for work?
I work at a bar.
How do you like it?
It's okay. The tips are good, but the hours can be long.
I bet. I used to work in a restaurant, so I know what you mean.
Yeah, it can be tough. But it's a good job for now.
What are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure. I'm thinking about going back to school to study film.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a good night.
